Package gcu_student.app

Class Salable

java.lang.Object
gcu_student.app.Salable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Salable>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Armor, Health, Weapon
public class Salable extends Object implements Comparable<Salable>
This class is the base class to all purchasable items in this program.

  • Constructor Details

    • Salable

      public Salable()
      The default contructor is needed to reconstruct from JSON

    • Salable

      public Salable(String name, String description, double price, int quantity)
      A non-default constructor that sets the name, description, price, quantity, and id attributes of the Salable
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the object available for purchase.
      description - Brief synopsis or background information on the item.
      price - Cost of item in USD.
      quantity - Number of that particular Salable in stock.

    • Salable

      public Salable(Salable original)
      Copy Constructor, it is the only way to create a new salable and not increment the idCount attribute
      Parameters:
      original - The salable being copied

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Salable salable)
      Returns whether the argument is later or earlier in the alphabet than the Salable that calls the method. Useful for sorting.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Salable>
      Parameters:
      salable - Object that is passed by value for comparison
      Returns:
      position Alphabetical order of the Salable names. 1 = "this" is earlier, -1 = "salable" is earlier, 0 = tie/same

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if the names of the items are the same, and is useful for the .contains() method from the ArrayList class invalid input: '&' the "==" operator
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      Object - it is the other object of comparison, which will be another Salable
      Returns:
      True if the both objects share the same name, and false otherwise
